pageContext.description: Part of the wooden shaft remains (about 292mm long).  Fairly sharp edges., Width:,  blade 55 mm,  socket 26 mm, Thickness:,  blade 20.75 mm,  Socket 27 mm, Weight not stated
pageContext.surface: Slightly pitted.  Slight traces of soil encrusted on.
pageContext.other: Georeference given is for Kew Bridge due to uncertainty of site of Brentford Ferry.
pageContext.collection: London Museum,  St. James's SW.,  A 27600,  Bought April 1925
pageContext.site: England,  middlesex, chiswick (opposite one of the islands, between kew bridge and brentford ferry),  r. thames
